description.raw:
Depends on [ign-sensors pull request #81](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/81/support-manual-scene-updates-for-rendering/diff)

This updates the sensor system to make use of the manual scene update mode introduced in the [ign-sensors pull request](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-sensors/pull-requests/81/support-manual-scene-updates-for-rendering/diff).

I have been testing with one of the subt tunnel circuit practice worlds. For convenience, here’s a [world sdf file](https://bitbucket.org/snippets/iche033/Lj46XM/profilesdf) that strips out subt related systems and can be run using `ign gazebo`. I added 5 HD cameras @ 30Hz in the world. With this PR, the sensor manager update time reduced from at 0.08x to 0.04x seconds

Depends on ign-sensors pull request #81

This updates the sensor system to make use of the manual scene update mode introduced in the ign-sensors pull request.

I have been testing with one of the subt tunnel circuit practice worlds. For convenience, here’s a world sdf file that strips out subt related systems and can be run using ign gazebo.
